installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Terraria Installation Script - Vers√£o Final Limpa
set -e

echo "üêß Instalando servidor Terraria..."

# Instalar depend√™ncias
echo "üì¶ Instalando depend√™ncias..."
export DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive
apt-get update -qq > /dev/null 2>&1
apt-get install -y -qq curl wget unzip > /dev/null 2>&1

cd /mnt/server

echo "üì• Baixando Terraria vers√£o 1.4.4.9..."
DOWNLOAD_URL="https://terraria.org/api/download/pc-dedicated-server/terraria-server-1449.zip"

# Download com retry
for i in {1..3}; do
    if wget -q "${DOWNLOAD_URL}" -O terraria-server.zip; then
        echo "‚úÖ Download conclu√≠do"
        break
    else
        echo "‚ùå Tentativa ${i}/3 falhou"
        if [ $i -eq 3 ]; then
            echo "‚ùå Todas as tentativas falharam"
            exit 1
        fi
        sleep 2
    fi
done

# Extrair arquivo
echo "üì¶ Extraindo servidor..."
unzip -q terraria-server.zip

# Encontrar e copiar arquivos
EXTRACTED_DIR=$(find . -maxdepth 1 -type d -name "*[0-9]*" | head -1)
if [ -z "$EXTRACTED_DIR" ]; then
    echo "‚ùå Diret√≥rio extra√≠do n√£o encontrado"
    exit 1
fi

echo "üìÅ Copiando arquivos Linux..."
cp -r "${EXTRACTED_DIR}/Linux/"* ./

# Verificar execut√°vel
if [ ! -f "TerrariaServer.bin.x86_64" ]; then
    echo "‚ùå Execut√°vel n√£o encontrado"
    exit 1
fi

# Configurar permiss√µes
echo "üîß Configurando permiss√µes..."
chmod +x TerrariaServer.bin.x86_64
chmod +x TerrariaServer 2>/dev/null || true

# Limpeza
echo "üßπ Limpando arquivos tempor√°rios..."
rm -rf "$EXTRACTED_DIR" terraria-server.zip

# Criar configura√ß√£o
echo "‚öôÔ∏è Criando configura√ß√£o do servidor..."
cat > serverconfig.txt << EOF
worldpath=/home/container/saves/Worlds
worldname=${WORLD_NAME}
world=/home/container/saves/Worlds/${WORLD_NAME}.wld
difficulty=${WORLD_DIFFICULTY}
autocreate=${WORLD_SIZE}
port=${SERVER_PORT}
maxplayers=${MAX_PLAYERS}
motd=${SERVER_MOTD}
seed=${WORLD_SEED}
password=${PASSWORD}
EOF

# Criar diret√≥rios
echo "üìÅ Criando diret√≥rios..."
mkdir -p saves/Worlds
chown -R 1000:1000 saves/ 2>/dev/null || true

# Verifica√ß√£o final simples
echo "üîç Verifica√ß√£o final..."
if [ -x "TerrariaServer.bin.x86_64" ]; then
    echo "‚úÖ Execut√°vel configurado corretamente"
    echo "üìè Tamanho: $(du -h TerrariaServer.bin.x86_64 | cut -f1)"
else
    echo "‚ùå Execut√°vel n√£o tem permiss√µes corretas"
    exit 1
fi

echo "‚úÖ INSTALA√á√ÉO CONCLU√çDA COM SUCESSO!"
echo "üéÆ Servidor pronto para iniciar na porta ${SERVER_PORT}"
echo "üë• M√°ximo de jogadores: ${MAX_PLAYERS}"
echo "üåç Mundo: ${WORLD_NAME}"
echo "üöÄ Comando: ./TerrariaServer.bin.x86_64 -config serverconfig.txt"

exit 0
